title: Authorization - Create Group
test_description: Authorization - Create Group: Create temporary group TEMP_GROUP_OQ105 for testing authorization.

api_calls.name: check_existing_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const resources = responseData.Resources || []; const groupId = resources.length > 0 ? resources[0].id : null; const groupExists = groupId !== null; return { ...currentVariables, group_id: groupId, group_exists: groupExists }; }

api_calls.name: delete_existing_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData === '' || responseData === null; const deletedGroupId = currentVariables.group_id; return { ...currentVariables, delete_success: success, deleted_group_id: deletedGroupId }; }

api_calls.name: poll_for_group_deletion
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const deletedGroupId = currentVariables.deleted_group_id; if (!deletedGroupId) { return { ...currentVariables, deletion_verified: true, polling_deletion_completed: true }; } logger.debug('Beginning polling for group deletion'); let pollAttempts = 0; const maxAttempts = 15; const pollInterval = 2000; while (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { pollAttempts++; logger.debug('Deletion polling attempt ' + pollAttempts + ' of ' + maxAttempts); try { const response = await axios.get(`${currentVariables.workspace_url}/api/2.0/account/scim/v2/Groups`, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${currentVariables.token}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: { filter: 'displayName eq "TEMP_GROUP_OQ105"' } }); const resources = response.data.Resources || []; const groupStillExists = resources.some(group => group.id === deletedGroupId); if (!groupStillExists) { logger.debug('Group successfully deleted'); return { ...currentVariables, deletion_verified: true, polling_deletion_completed: true, deletion_poll_attempts: pollAttempts }; } else { logger.debug('Group still exists, waiting...'); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } catch (error) { logger.error('Deletion polling error:', error.message); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } logger.debug('Deletion polling completed after ' + maxAttempts + ' attempts'); return { ...currentVariables, deletion_verified: false, polling_deletion_completed: true, deletion_poll_attempts: maxAttempts, deletion_polling_timeout: true }; }

api_calls.name: create_group
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData?.id ? true : false; const newGroupId = responseData?.id || null; return { ...currentVariables, create_success: success, new_group_id: newGroupId }; }

api_calls.name: poll_for_group_availability
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const newGroupId = currentVariables.new_group_id; if (!newGroupId) { return { ...currentVariables, group_verified: false, polling_completed: true }; } logger.debug('Beginning polling for group availability'); let pollAttempts = 0; const maxAttempts = 30; const pollInterval = 2000; while (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { pollAttempts++; logger.debug('Polling attempt ' + pollAttempts + ' of ' + maxAttempts); try { const response = await axios.get(`${currentVariables.workspace_url}/api/2.0/account/scim/v2/Groups`, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${currentVariables.token}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: { filter: 'displayName eq "TEMP_GROUP_OQ105"' } }); const resources = response.data.Resources || []; const foundGroup = resources.find(group => group.id === newGroupId); if (foundGroup) { logger.debug('Group found and available'); return { ...currentVariables, group_verified: true, verified_group_id: foundGroup.id, polling_completed: true, poll_attempts: pollAttempts }; } else { logger.debug('Group not found yet, waiting...'); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } catch (error) { logger.error('Polling error:', error.message); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } logger.debug('Polling completed after ' + maxAttempts + ' attempts'); return { ...currentVariables, group_verified: false, polling_completed: true, poll_attempts: maxAttempts, polling_timeout: true }; }
